title: Would You Endorse Dating The Younger Version Of Yourself?
description:
If someone said they're dating a younger version of you, what advice would you give them? Would you tell them to run or not? 
In this case, a listener is asking Bert this question. She's dating a guy who she thinks is the younger version of him. Will he endorse this guy or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
